*[Investigations Services for the Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada]*
================================================.sayComputing buccagna-lung Science
=====================================================


### Notification of Tender Opportunity

The [Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada](https://www.privacy.gc.ca/en) is seeking proposals from qualified service providers to deliver investigations services for the review and/or investigation of complaints received under the Privacy Act (PA) and the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act (PIPEDA).

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

RFP Sol No: P2400049
Amendment No: 7
Date Published: 21 July 2023
Tender Closing Date: 6 September 2023 12:00 PM EDT

### Key Dates

*  Expected Contract Start Date: 1 October 2023
*  Expected Contract End Date: 30 September 2025

### Service Details

The selected service provider will be required to conduct complaint file reviews and/or investigations under the PA and PIPEDA, primarily through Expedited Review (ER) processes. The service provider will work closely with the ER Manager to resolve backlogged complaint files and/or investigations under the PA and/or PIPEDA, in accordance with OPC procedures.

### Eligibility Criteria

Eligible bidders must be able to demonstrate their ability to deliver high-quality investigations services, as well as their experience working with government organizations and familiarity with OPC procedures.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposal submissions will be evaluated on the basis of their combined assessment of technical merit and price. The selected service provider will be required to meet the following evaluation criteria:

* Technical merit: The service provider's ability to deliver high-quality investigations services, as well as their experience working with government organizations and familiarity with OPC procedures.
* Price: The total price quoted by the service provider for the provision of investigations services.

### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the RFP and all associated attachments, are available on [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). Interested bidders must submit their proposal electronically in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP.

### Contact Information

For more information or to submit a proposal, please contact:

Lise Andrée Pitre
OPCProcurement-CPVPApprovisionnement@chrc-ccdp.gc.ca
(819) 208-7919
